content:
I'd be happy to help you compare prices for your trip to Tokyo in May.

To get the most accurate prices, I'll need to know a few more details from you. Please provide me with the following information:

1. Your departure city (or cities you're considering flying from)
2. Your travel dates (specific dates in May or a range of dates you're flexible with)
3. Your preferred class of travel (Economy, Premium Economy, Business, or First Class)
4. Any loyalty programs or credit cards you have that may influence your airline choice

Once I have this information, I can provide you with a comparison of prices for ANA, Japan Airlines, and Singapore Airlines.

Alternatively, you can also use flight comparison websites like Google Flights, Skyscanner, or Kayak to get an idea of prices. However, I can help you navigate the results and provide more personalized recommendations.

Let me know if you have any questions or concerns!
